title: Flashare
author: Flashare
content: we're the first fundraising platform built on Polygon that allows people to get funded with less then 0.05MATICYou can create a fundme in less then 30 seconds,you just need to compile the form that require a title,description,goal and section of the fundme and then you share the link,simple as that!we have 2 tokens FSX,GFSXFSX: allows investors to take part in the actual project by buying a part,currently for sale on quickswap and uniswapGFSX: this is the gas token of the platform, you can spend them by creating a fundme, and earn by donating MATIC to other users, receiving a cashback in GFSX, only for sale at our gas stationwe even have a NFT collection that document the project day after day since went online,it is currently located on Opensea under the name of HistoryFlashare.platform= https://www.flashare.app/NFT collection: https://opensea.io/collection/flashareSocials:https://www.instagram.com/flashareapp/https://twitter.com/AppFlashare
